member.name: MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_OPTIONS
member.summary: Defines flags for serializing and deserializing attribute stores.

member.name: MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_OPTIONS.MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_UNKNOWN_BYREF
member.summary: If this flag is set, IUnknown pointers in the attribute store are marshaled to and from the stream. If this flag is absent, IUnknown pointers in the attribute store are not marshaled or serialized.
